dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Wait, I just read this and… did you know Kanye West, uh, has never voted before? Like, ever?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wait, I just read this and... did you know Kanye West, uh, has never voted before? Like, ever?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In a wide-ranging interview with Forbes last month about his political aspirations, West, who has never voted before, laid out a platform for his Birthday Party that included a pro-life plank that alleged that Planned Parenthood was placed in cities by white supremacists, a management style patterned on the fictional country of Wakanda in Black Panther and anti-vaccine conspiracy theories.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: I know, right?! How is that even possible? It's just... it's wild.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I know, right?! How is that even possible? It's just... it's wild.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And he's running for president. No, wait, he says he's walking to win. And practicing his dance moves!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And he's running for president. No, wait, he says he's walking to win. And practicing his dance moves!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Asked about that directly, West said that rather than running for president, he was walking, quickly adding that he was walking . . . to win.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh my gosh, yes, the dance moves! He even said he's doing it to, like, siphon votes from Biden!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh my gosh, yes, the dance moves! He even said he's doing it to, like, siphon votes from Biden!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: the billionaire rap superstar indicated, in an interview by text today, that he was in fact running to siphon votes from the presumptive Democratic nominee, Joe Biden.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! He said that out loud! He's not even denying he's a spoiler.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! He said that out loud! He's not even denying he's a spoiler.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: And West was eager to criticize Biden, and expressed comfort with the idea of doing damage to the former vice presidents White House chances. Im not denying it; I just told you.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, he just says, "Jesus is King, and my campaign slogan is 'Vote Yeezy!'" Like, what?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, he just says, Jesus is King, and my campaign slogan is 'Vote Yeezy!' Like, what?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: West replied: Im not going to argue with you. Jesus is King.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: "Vote Yeezy!" And Trump, uh, literally whispered to his staff that Kanye's "been a real asset!" With a wink!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Vote Yeezy! And Trump, uh, literally whispered to his staff that Kanye's been a real asset! With a wink!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: I like Kanye very much, President Trump told reporters at the White House yesterday. No, I have nothing to do with him getting on the ballot. We'll have to see what happens.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: A wink! Yes! It’s so… transparent. And the GOP operatives trying to get him on ballots in, like, Wisconsin?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A wink! Yes! It's so... transparent. And the G O P operatives trying to get him on ballots in, like, Wisconsin?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Wests intentions have come under increased scrutiny this week, following reports by CNN, New York, the New York Times and others, about efforts by GOP political operatives to get him onto several ballots, including states like Wisconsin that could be pivotal in deciding the next president.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, in pivotal states! And he's just rebuffing questions about any coordination. But we know.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, in pivotal states! And he's just rebuffing questions about any coordination. But we know.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: West rebuffed various attempts to clarify who was driving his ballot access or strategy and whether its being coordinated by or with Republican-affiliated officials.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, but he says it's a "God production." Not a Kanye production, a God production.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, but he says it's a God production. Not a Kanye production, a God production.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: When I pointed out to West that the slapdash operation to get him on the ballot, which includes one operative previously arrested for voter fraud and multiple West electors from the same address, didnt feel like a Kanye West production, West replied that it was a God production.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: A "God production" with an operative who was arrested for voter fraud, by the way. I mean, come on!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A God production with an operative who was arrested for voter fraud, by the way. I mean, come on!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: When I pointed out to West that the slapdash operation to get him on the ballot, which includes one operative previously arrested for voter fraud and multiple West electors from the same address, didnt feel like a Kanye West production, West replied that it was a God production.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And the whole Betsy DeVos thing? About, like, designing a school and post-COVID curriculum?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And the whole Betsy DeVos thing? About, like, designing a school and post-COVID curriculum?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: West says that hes designing a school within the next month and that Im meeting with Betsy DeVos about the post-Covid curriculum.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yes! She said it looked great! And asked to sit in on classes. It's just, uh, it's a lot.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes! She said it looked great! And asked to sit in on classes. It's just, uh, it's a lot.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: (The Secretary of Educations press office hadnt responded to a request for comment by the time we published.)

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And the "Birthday Party" platform. Wakanda management! Anti-vaccine stuff!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And the Birthday Party platform. Wakanda management! Anti-vaccine stuff!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In a wide-ranging interview with Forbes last month about his political aspirations, West, who has never voted before, laid out a platform for his Birthday Party that included a pro-life plank that alleged that Planned Parenthood was placed in cities by white supremacists, a management style patterned on the fictional country of Wakanda in Black Panther and anti-vaccine conspiracy theories.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And the Planned Parenthood comments! About white supremacists! That was... woah.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And the Planned Parenthood comments! About white supremacists! That was... woah.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In a wide-ranging interview with Forbes last month about his political aspirations, West, who has never voted before, laid out a platform for his Birthday Party that included a pro-life plank that alleged that Planned Parenthood was placed in cities by white supremacists, a management style patterned on the fictional country of Wakanda in Black Panther and anti-vaccine conspiracy theories.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah. But then he was also dumping Trump for hiding in a bunker, but now he's saying Trump's the closest president to allowing God back into the conversation.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah. But then he was also dumping Trump for hiding in a bunker, but now he's saying Trump's the closest president to allowing God back into the conversation.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In that interview, West also claimed that he was dumping Trump. I am taking the red hat off, with this interview. His reason: It looks like one big mess to me. I dont like that I caught wind that he hid in the bunker. ... Trump is the closest president weve had in years to allowing God to still be part of the conversation, he said.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: I can't keep up! It’s just so messy.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I can't keep up! It's just so messy.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: So messy. Like, is he, uh, being used? He wouldn't even answer that.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So messy. Like, is he, uh, being used? He wouldn't even answer that.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: West did not respond when asked whether he feels hes being used.
